channel.title: Client.java, PlayerRights (donator)
channel.description:
How would i make donator player rights? I used the search button and it said to search
playerIsMember = 1;
But when i search that i get nothing... and i dont know what else to search... can someone please help?

item.title: Client.java, PlayerRights (donator)
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:2, topic:298016”]Just look under the character’s rights for something related to Member = #

Change the # to a 1 if you have membership/donator coded into your server.[/quote]

Look in what because obviously its not client.java. I don’t have donator rights coded into my server, i just need to know how to add donator player rights

Read full topic

item.title: Client.java, PlayerRights (donator)
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Just look under the character’s rights for something related to Member = #

Change the # to a 1 if you have membership/donator coded into your server.

Read full topic
